channel.title: Shrooms
channel.description: My birthday was very recently and I met up with my cousin yesterday whom has the same birthday as me. We talked about drugs and such, and psychadelic mushrooms came up in conversation. Apparently he's been growing them for about 10 years, and he gave me half a ziplock bag full of them. I want to try them but I have no idea how many I should eat. Also, would it be a bad idea to take one before bed and have mad weird dreams?

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

I would take it with friends, take about an 1/8th each, and go some place cool and outdoors like an arboretum or park.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Archer:

Don’t take them if you have any worrying thoughts on your mind or plans as it may induce a bad trip. Don’t take them before bed and have at least 6 to 8 hours to trip.

I thought you were dead

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Depends on what type of shroom it is, but a typical dose of the most common shroom (Psilocybe cubensis) is about 2.5 grams.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

They sell for 30$ an eighth in the states. I’v personally done shrooms 5 times and enjoyed every single trip. Take 3-4 nice sized ones on your first go, have plenty of free time ahead of you as the next 6 hours are going to be pretty interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

I bought a fag packet full for £20, was good for me and 3 other people.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’ve always wussed out of the opportunity to take shrooms. Also worried about having a bad trip and all that. AFAIK shrooms don’t sell for very much over here (UK).

I say you go for it with a group of close mates, could be a really good experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Don’t take them if you have any worrying thoughts on your mind or plans as it may induce a bad trip. Don’t take them before bed and have at least 6 to 8 hours to trip.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:377724”]what are they?

and you most likely would just never get to sleep[/quote]

I’ll post a pic in a sec I gotta get my shitberry cord. I wanna sell some but I have absolutely no idea the price or weight or pretty much anything about them.

edit:

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I personally had a bad trip and do not recommend them. My own opinion though; its your own choice if you do them or not.

Read full topic
